message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I believe this reflects its true worth and potential.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $650,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  To be fair to both of us, I can go down to $925,000. This is a significant reduction and reflects my willingness to make a deal.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $925,000. I'm willing to go up to $850,000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me in the middle?
